'''Court of Justice's Fresh Mist''' is an outdoor gift set favored by the companions: [[Neuvillette]], [[Furina]] and [[Emilie]].

The blueprint is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=240}}.
